info.para: An example of reducing a system of linear equations to RREF.

statement.para: Every system of linear equations can be transformed into equivalent to one which is in RREF using the following three operations.

li.para: Interchanging of two equations in a system of linear equations
Multiplying an equation by a non-zero number
Adding any multiple of one equation to another

statement.para: Moreover, the row reduced form of a system of linear equations is unique.
